name: Cheshire Cat
flavor_text: Alice felt quite confused. "But I don't see much ink here at all. How can the flood still be changing the Inklands?" "Things are always changing, you know," said the cat. "It would be a change if they didn't."
text: Chosen character gains Challenger +2 and Resist +2 this turn. (They get +2 {s} while challenging. Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)
